ygData.subject: Re: Hungry Earth for Necromancers.
ygData.msgSnippet: ... wonders what spell you are speaking of. Also on the Xegony server would be glad to work on languages with anyone interested. It seems at level 16 I put 1
ygData.messageBody:
kalekona@... wrote:

> From: <kalekona@...>
>
> I have looked in all the research books and this spell is
> not present.

wonders what spell you are speaking of.

Also on the Xegony server would be glad to work on languages with anyone interested.
It seems at level 16 I put 1 point into research and have been unable to train any further in it any attempt at
rune combination fails due to skill - now level 19 and wondering how folks got skill up enough to combine runes
for a spell. My Old Erudian is only up to average but I have blown a tone of points on it and have met no one
with a higher skill so far - changing zones with a buddy seemed to work but only for an additional 6 pts or so
even after many rezonings the skill would no longer rise.


Xzar - Wizard of Xegony
